mapper.select: SELECT p.product_code, p.product_name, c.lclas, c.sclas FROM product_info p LEFT JOIN product_category c ON p.product_code = c.product_code WHERE p.product_type = 'PT02' AND p.product_code LIKE '%' || #{productCode} || '%' AND p.product_name LIKE '%' || #{productName} || '%' AND c.lclas = #{lclas} AND c.sclas = #{sclas} ORDER BY product_code DESC
SELECT product_size, get_comm(product_size) AS size_name, product_color FROM product_option WHERE product_code = #{productCode} AND discontinued = 'YN02' ORDER BY product_color, product_size

WITH temp AS( -- 임시 테이블 지정 SELECT product_color, product_size FROM product_option WHERE product_code = #{productCode} ) SELECT * FROM temp PIVOT( COUNT(null) -- 열과 행을 바꿔 선택한 컬럼으로 그룹함수 실행 FOR product_size IN ( -- '값' alias, ... 'SI01' s, 'SI02' m, 'SI03' l, 'SI110' "110" ) )pvt ORDER BY product_color

WITH temp AS( -- 임시 테이블 지정 SELECT d.product_code, d.product_color, -- o로 변경 필요 d.product_size, d.supply_qy FROM supply_plan s JOIN supply_plan_details d ON s.supply_plan_code = d.supply_plan_code LEFT JOIN product_option o ON d.product_code = o.product_code AND d.product_size = o.product_size AND d.product_color = o.product_color WHERE d.product_code = 'PRD0001' AND s.supply_plan_code = #{supplyPlanCode} ) SELECT * FROM temp PIVOT( SUM(supply_qy) -- 열과 행을 바꿔 선택한 컬럼으로 그룹함수 실행 FOR product_size IN ( -- '값' alias, ... 'SI01' s, 'SI02' m, 'SI03' l, 'SI110' "110" ) )pvt ORDER BY product_color
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO supply_plan (SUPPLY_PLAN_CODE, SUPPLY_YEAR, SEASON, CHARGER_CODE, CHARGER_NAME, REMARK) VALUES ((SELECT 'SUD' || LPAD(NVL(SUBSTR(MAX(supply_plan_code), -4), 0) + 1, 4, 0) FROM supply_plan), #{supplyYear}, #{season}, #{chargerCode}, #{chargerName}, #{remark})

INSERT INTO supply_plan_details (SUPPLY_PLAN_DETAIL_CODE, SUPPLY_PLAN_CODE, PRODUCT_CODE, PRODUCT_COLOR, PRODUCT_SIZE, SUPPLY_QY, SUPPLY_DATE) VALUES ((SELECT 'SUD' || LPAD(NVL(SUBSTR(MAX(supply_plan_detail_code), -4), 0) + 1, 4, 0) FROM supply_plan_details), -- 다음 번호 조회 (SELECT MAX(supply_plan_code) FROM supply_plan), #{productCode}, #{productColor}, #{productSize}, #{supplyQy}, #{supplyDate})
